text: Ariko amezi matagatifu narangira (ukwa mbere, ukwa karindwi, ukwa cumi na kumwe n’ukwa cumi n’abiri y’ikirangaminsi cya kiyisilamu), mujye mwica ababangikanyamana (barenze ku masezerano mwagiranye bakanifatanya n’umwanzi wanyu) aho muzajya mubasanga hose. Muzajye mubacakira, mubagote munabubikire muri buri bwubikiro. Ariko nibicuza (bakareka kubangikanya Imana) bagakora amasengesho bakanatanga amaturo, muzajye mubareka. Mu by’ukuri, Allah ni Ubabarira ibyaha, Nyirimbabazi
